title: sarva lOka dhayaanidhE
sahitya:
sarvalOka dayAnidhE sArvabhauma dAsharathE

caraNam 1

 panca bhUtamulaku nAthuDanucu delisikoNTi
   
caraNam 2

 bhUsutA karamu baTTi bhUmi velayuvAdu nIvu
   
caraNam 3

 nIradhipai bAga yOga nidra sEyuvADu nIvu

   
caraNam 4

 kamala bandhu kulajavarula gaDatEcinavADu nIvu
   
caraNam 5

 pavamAna kumAruNDu baNTaina vADu nIvu
   
caraNam 6

 antarikSa kEshanutAnanta nAmarUpa rahita
   
caraNam 7

 jnAna vairAgya bhakti dAna mosaguvADa nIvu
   
caraNam 8

 Agama nigamAtIta tyAgarAja vinuta carita
